title: [Stat撚]Bivariate continuous distribution 求神人解答

replies.msg:
Let T1 and T2 be numbers of days for a company to complete two steps in a certain process. They have the joint pdf that

f(t1,t2)=c where 1<t1<10 , 2<t2<6 , t1+t2<14

a)Determine c.
b)Find P(T1+T2 > 10)
c)Find P(T1 < T2 given that T1+T2 < 10)

求高手們解答

好似唔難
畫晒啲region出嚟睇下先啦

integrate完 搵到個constant係1/14 但係畫返幅3D graph出嚟 唔止14個option

好似唔難
畫晒啲region出嚟睇下先啦


我geometry唔多掂 同埋本身我對呢個topic有啲弱 唔係好識畫


integrate完 搵到個constant係1/14 但係畫返幅3D graph出嚟 唔止14個option

我做到c=1/34

btw 個 distribution 係 continuous 㗎喎，你點樣數啲option㗎

(A) area = 4x9-2x2/2 = 34
c=1/34
(B) area = 34-4x3-4x4/2 = 14
Prob = 14/34 = 7/17
(C) area = 20-3x6/2 = 11
Prob = 11/20

好亂 慢慢睇

搵係搵到 但係個integration 搵個c 唔知自己有冇錯
因為我in完c=1/14 咁即係 x(2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9) y(3,4,5)
咁嘅combination都有23個 咁點解c個denominator會係14

Thanks for both of you
因為我base on佢個rule integrate完個pdf會係1
所以 in f(t1,t2) = 1 where the lower limit of t1 = 2 upper=9 and t2 lower= 3, upper =5
我嘗試理解下 你地所講先 Thank you so much

你用2做lower bound 咁你點capture 1去2既可能性？
你用錯summation我都冇咁嬲
